column3: Cabinet, 6A20 Head, complete, covering per customer spec.
6A20 Chassis kit. Chassis, brass plate, fiber boards
Footswitch,  2 button, Fender type, with phono plugs
Cable, reverb, 4', straight plug on both ends
Bolt, machine, #4-40x5/16, with nut and star washer
Chassis mount phone jack, non shorting
Slide Switch for use as bright switch
2" black drywall screw for mounting reverb pan
